task.title: Open a model
task.shortdesc: Open a .uml model file using the Project Explorer view.

step.cmd: Assure that you are in the Resource Perspective, or some other perspective that has the Project Explorer view open. Note that the Java perspective Package Explorer view will not show the model tree navigator.
Open a UML model file (with extension .uml) by double-clicking that file in the Project Explorer, or right-clicking the file and choosing Open Model from the context menu.

Open the UML Table Editor by double-clicking on a .uml model file, or selecting Open WithUML Table from the context menu of a model element in the navigator tree. A model element is a package or class contained in the model; it is not the .uml file.
